text: he amara palanahara! Ame sambhalyum ke avaja apanara mota avaje imana tarapha pokari rahyo che, ke loko! Potana palanahara para imana lavo, basa! Ame imana lavya, he palanahara! Have tum amara guna mapha kari dem ane amari bura'i amarathi dura kari dem ane amaru mrtyu sadacari loko manthi kara
